org.sensorhub.impl.sensor

Class AbstractSensorModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.module.AbstractModule<ConfigType>
      • org.sensorhub.impl.sensor.AbstractSensorModule<ConfigType>
  • Type Parameters:
    ConfigType -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventProducer, IDataProducerModule<ConfigType>, IModuleWithDescription, IModule<ConfigType>, ISensorModule<ConfigType>

    public abstract class AbstractSensorModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>
extends AbstractModule<ConfigType>
implements ISensorModule<ConfigType>

    Class providing default implementation of common sensor API methods. By default, sensor description history and updates are reported as unsupported.
    This can be used as the base for most sensor driver implementations.

    Since:
    Oct 30, 2014
    Author:
    Alex Robin

      • getLastDescriptionUpdate

        public long getLastDescriptionUpdate()
        Description copied from interface: IModuleWithDescription
        Used to check when SensorML description was last updated. This is useful to avoid requesting the object when it hasn't changed.
        Specified by:
        getLastDescriptionUpdate in interface IModuleWithDescription
        Returns:
        Date/time of last description update as unix time (ms since 1970) or Long.MIN_VALUE if description was never updated.

      • getCurrentFeatureOfInterest

        public AbstractFeature getCurrentFeatureOfInterest()
        Description copied from interface: IDataProducerModule
        Retrieves the feature of interest for which this producer is currently generating data.

        In the case of a module generating data from multiple entities (e.g. sensor network), the feature of interest currently observed by a given entity can be retrieved using IMultiSourceDataProducer.getCurrentFeatureOfInterest(String)
        Specified by:
        getCurrentFeatureOfInterest in interface IDataProducerModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>
        Returns:
        map of entityID to feature objects

      • updateConfig

        public void updateConfig(ConfigType config)
                  throws SensorHubException
        Description copied from interface: IModule
        Updates the module's configuration dynamically.
        The module must honor this new configuration unless an error is detected. It is the responsability of the module to initiate a restart if the new configuration requires it.
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
